title: Should Fiora be removed From LOL?
body:
Im still salty asf but i think that fiora should be removed from the game as she seems to have the ability to faceroll in every game that i am in (exaggerating a bit but still...). 

she seems to have some balancing issues that either wont be recognised or fixed. i think that LOL would be a better game as a whole without the constant annoyance that is Fiora. 

i know there a ways to counter her but even these seem so niche that the average player would not be able to sucessfully counter her.

In short, please remove fiora from the game as it would make it a better place.

Curious to see the result please volte on the poll.

replies.body: what do you mean she is really really Balance Champ she only Faceroll when ahead, when she behind she pretty much useless cause she cant really build tank and the nerf she got coming it next patch she will be even more balance. and ONLY a good fiora to made that champ broken anyway the timing with your W and the way you hit the Vial. talking about removing a REAL Broken is Master YI, easy to play easy to get cheese

Fiora is a champion that requires good decision making & positioning more than mechanical skill. 

There are a couple of ways you can beat her (that even the average player can pull off ezpz):

* Lvl 1 engage, bait out her Q. At level 1 her Q has a 16 second CD. If you can, try to bait this out and go in for a balls-to-the-wall engage. During this time, try to keep minions in your favour (do not fight her without your minion wave as she has quite high base damage).


* Full on engage when abilities are down. Her abilities have rather long CDs during laning phase. Without her abilities, she has no escape, no defence, no real way of getting out of situations where the enemy laner is jumping on her face.


* During laning phase VS a Fiora, you must be constantly harassing her and zoning her from farm. Even if she doesn't end up getting kills, if she gets enough CS gold to buy hydra, she is going to get a massive power spike and it is gonna be a bad time. Once again, champions that have short CD abilities (to engage after baiting hers) and constant poke are good for this. 


* Be super nice to your jungler and ask for early ganks to put her even further behind. 

You can counter her through champions and itemization (which is even easier, especially when you are like me and have potato mechanics):

* Counterpicking champs. If you are playing ranked there is a chance that you will be able to make your choice and pick into fora. I would advise someone with short laning phase cooldowns (so you can full on engage when her abilities are on CD), and/or someone who can build tank in the case that she does end up strong. Think: Panth, Renek, Singed, Malph (her true damage passive is annoying, but if you are playing smart, you will be protecting your vitals).
 

* Fiora works really well with attack speed. Build a randuins/ frozen heart (this also works really well when versing devourer junglers).


* You can also build QSS to counter her ultimate (no ult = no team wide heal). Even if your champ isn't a QSS type of champ, suggest your ADC picks it up (ADC is most likely going to be targeted anyway, due to squish).


While her abilities are strong (and her passive, very strong), Fiora has a lot of counter play. Her duelling capabilities also make her feel quite unique (which is something Riot aim to do).

Nah fiora too strong, remove it.
